titleStmt.title: Theyr dedes in effecte my lyfe wolde haue Stephen Wynton. Your dedes in effecte that made your lyfe braue / H.S.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Stephen, 1483?-1555.
H. S.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Two poems on recto of sheet, the first signed "Stephen Wynton", the second signed "H.S."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
